entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
